name: Sylvans
author: zw31_4z1g
notes:
Nothing much to see here. Climbing was really hard as the top decks have a weird rock/scissors/paper relationship. Whenever I came close to ranking up, Spellbooks or an unlucky draw in the mirror would ruin the day. 

Also, I do not have Amazoness Queen yet and my Mai never seems to drop Swordswoman. Hopefully the deck remains viable next season though!
